name: Mead Runner
description:
Mead Runner is the first of hopefully many chapters in a bizarre adventure game made for the MYST Jam. You have crash landed on an alien planet on your way to delivering a shipment of "mead" to Space Station #00FFFF. Other sentient transports appear to have crash landed there previously. Will you be able to repair your ship and deliver your precious cargo or will you find another way to get off this crazy planet?!
Should provide about 30 minutes of entertainment including Easter eggs familiar to the MYST universe.

If you have already played and want more, respond HERE.

Art & Story by Tyler Jacobson
Music by Chase Bethea
Made with Fusion by Scott Jacobson #MadewithFusion

Glitchy HTML5 Web Version HERE
